segments.text: I'm still watching those two children near the cookie jar.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: They've got quite the plan going, don't they?
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The boy is really stretching up there, determined to get those treats.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I can tell he's excited, with his hand deep in the jar.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: His little sister is so patient, just waiting for her turn.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: There's something really endearing about their covert operation.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: They're working together like a tiny, effective team.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I can almost taste the deliciousness of those cookies myself.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: It's a classic childhood moment, sneaking a forbidden treat.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I hope they get a good haul before anyone notices.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The risks are there, of course, but for now, it's just pure, simple joy.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Their faces are so full of anticipation and delight.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: It's a small victory for them in the grand scheme of things.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: This is the kind of memory they'll probably laugh about years from now.
segments.speaker: PAR
